original_text: The same period is referred to in Revelation 12:6 as "a thousand two hundred and threescore days." This elucidates that a "time" corresponds to one year or 360 days; two "times," two years or 720 days; and "half a time," half a year or 180 days, cumulatively totaling 1,260 days.
